TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypeDescriptionProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 向 提供补充元数据。

span.span: Provides supplemental metadata to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类动态扩展通过添加、 修改或隐藏特征，例如属性、 属性和事件类型或对象与关联的类型信息。The class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events. 可以有多个产品/服务与单一的元数据的类型说明提供程序类。There can be multiple type description provider classes that offer metadata to a single . 有两种方法将相关联与:There are two ways to associate a with a : - 在设计时，当目标类可以分配适当标记。At design time, when the target class can be assigned the appropriate tag. - 在运行时，当一个的方法的可以调用类。At run time, when one of the methods of the class can be called. 这些重载的方法需要目标对象或其类的类型。These overloaded methods require either the target object or its class type. 类依赖于在构造期间提供的相同类型的父对象。The class relies on a parent object of the same type, supplied during construction. 这允许派生的类有选择地重写方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods. 实例仅基于需求的自定义类型信息对性能影响降至最低。Instances of are only built upon demand, minimizing the impact of custom type information on performance. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited.

span.para: 您的派生的类型可能被标记为或，但在类型的实例可以使用创建类。不要编写不安全的代码假定调用方是受信任。而是假设调用方可能会在部分信任环境中创建类型的实例。

Your derived type might be marked as or , but an instance of your type can be created with the class. Do not write insecure code by assuming the caller is trusted. Assume instead that callers might create instances of your type in partial trust.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数是等效于调用另构造函数的参数值与`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter value that is `null`.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent type description provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`参数是`null`，则所有方法将返回默认值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否则为所有方法将委托给的方法`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 下表显示了默认返回值为方法。The following table shows the default return values for methods. |方法Method|默认返回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||`null`| ||新创建的对象通过调用方法。A newly created object through a call to the method.| ||默认实例类。A default instance of a class.| ||默认实例类。A default instance of a class.| ||`objectType`第一个参数。The `objectType` first parameter.|

summary.span: 创建可替换为另一种数据类型的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
The substitute .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定`provider`通过传递参数方法的类。The specified by the `provider` parameter is passed in by the method of the class. 如果`provider`不是`null`，服务提供商可以由类型说明提供程序用于获取有关创建调用的其他上下文。If `provider` is not `null`, the service provider can be used by the type description provider to obtain additional context about the creation call. 方法是`virtual`，默认情况下，返回的结果方法如果`provider`是`null`。The method is `virtual` and, by default, returns the result of the method if `provider` is `null`. 如果`provider`是`null`，此方法将调用的父提供程序的方法。If `provider` is `null`, this method will invoke the method of the parent provider.

span.para: 如果派生的类不感兴趣提供替换实例，则只应调用基实现。
If the derived class is not interested in providing a substitute instance, it should just call the base implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.IDictionary GetCache (object instance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetCache(object instance) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetCache (instance As Object) As IDictionary
public: virtual System::Collections::IDictionary ^ GetCache(System::Object ^ instance);
abstract member GetCache : obj -> System.Collections.IDictionary override this.GetCache : obj -> System.Collections.IDictionary

param.name: instance
param.span: 要获取与其对应的缓存的对象。

span.span: The object for which to get the cache.

summary.span: 获取每个对象均对应有的缓存，此缓存可作为键/值对的 进行访问。

span.span: Gets a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs.

returns.span: 如果提供的对象支持缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: An if the provided object supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可能需要执行的元数据的集合上的复杂操作。A may need to perform complex operations on collections of metadata. 因为类型不是域的生存期内卸载类将自动缓存这些类型的操作的结果。Because types are not unloaded for the life of a domain, the class will automatically cache the results of these operations based on type. 但是，某些操作使用实时对象实例。However, some operations use live object instances. 这些操作不能缓存内类，因为缓存它们会防止对象被垃圾回收。These operations cannot be cached within the class because caching them would prevent the object from being garbage collected. 相反，类允许为每个对象的缓存，作为访问的键/值对，对某个对象存在。Instead, the class allows for a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs, to exist on an object. 方法返回此缓存的一个实例。The method returns an instance of this cache. 方法将返回`null`如果对象不支持的缓存。The method will return `null` if there is no supported cache for an object. 默认值由检查对象是否实现已就位的组件接口。The default used by examines the object to see if it is a sited component that implements the interface. 如果该对象，它使用字典服务对象的缓存存储。If the object is, it uses the dictionary service to store the object's cache. 否则，它返回的对象`null`。Otherwise, the object it returns `null`. 其他类型说明提供程序可能会提供其自己的实现此处。Other type description providers may provide their own implementation here. 例如，依赖关系对象只是附加类型的属性。For example, dependency objects can just attach a property of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (object instance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(object instance) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (instance As Object) As ICustomTypeDescriptor
public: virtual System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor ^ GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(System::Object ^ instance);
abstract member GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor override this.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor

param.name: instance
param.span: 要为其获取扩展类型说明符的对象。

span.span: The object for which to get the extended type descriptor.

summary.span: 为给定的对象获取扩展的自定义类型说明符。

span.span: Gets an extended custom type descriptor for the given object.

returns.span: 可以为对象提供扩展元数据的 。

span.span: An that can provide extended metadata for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展的类型说明符是产品/服务属性的其他对象已添加到此对象，但这不是实际在对象定义的自定义类型描述符。An extended type descriptor is a custom type descriptor that offers properties that other objects have added to this object, but that are not actually defined on the object. 例如，在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]组件模型对象实现接口可以将属性附加到其他对象驻留在相同的逻辑容器。For example, in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model, objects that implement the interface can attach properties to other objects that reside in the same logical container. 重载方法不返回提供这些额外的扩展属性的类型说明符。The overloaded methods do not return a type descriptor that provides these extra extended properties. 方法返回的这些扩展属性集。The method returns the set of these extended properties. 会自动合并这两个属性集合的结果。The will automatically merge the results of these two property collections. 虽然[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]组件模型只支持扩展属性，可用于扩展的属性，以及事件，如果类型说明提供程序支持它。While the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model supports only extended properties, can be used for extended attributes as well as events, if the type description provider supports it. 是`virtual`和默认情况下，返回自定义类型描述符返回空结果，如果没有父提供程序传递的。 is `virtual` and, by default, returns a custom type descriptor that returns empty results if no parent provider was passed. 如果传入父提供程序，此方法将调用父提供程序的方法。If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's method.
